1.content:
Mark was a 19 year old boy. He lives with his parents, who are very mean to him. He is an only child and was about to enter college. He had no friends and no girlfriend, so he was basically alone. The only thing he loved so much was Pokémon. He loved playing it in his Nintendo and Gameboy. He had pokemon giantess dreams and liked every second of it. "I wish I can be in the pokemon world and not be in this place so that I can have my fun" he muttered to himself one day while he was playing. That same night, while he was sleeping, a small yellow and white orb came to his room. While he was sleeping the orb was on top of him and saw his sleeping form. "I will make your wish come true" the orb giggles causing him to start to disappear. When he was finished the orb disappeared as well.

Mark wakes up to the feeling of dirt on his back. He gets up and noticed that he wasn't at his house. He looks around and realized that everything was big, VERY big. He starts to walk while looking around when the ground started to shake in a sort rhythm. He heard a bush rustling and when he looked at the bush, He saw......
1.title: A New World

11.content: He saw a pokemon coming out of the bush. That meant only one thing. He was in the pokemon world, meaning that his wish came true!. But he noticed something strange. The pokemon was bigger than he. His's eyes widen as he went to the conclusion that he somehow shrunk. But it didn't really matter since all Mark wanted was to be in a pokemon giantess fantasy. The pokemon was walking towards your direction, which gave you the chance to get closer and see which pokemon it is. When you get closer, you realized that the pokemon is.......
11.title: a pokemon

11121.content: There are many lovely fire types to choose from! Which one are you interested in?
11121.title: Turning up the Head

111211.content: Which Pokemon in the family do you want to meet?
111211.title: Fennekin Family

choices: The Braixen eating a berry. But it seemed that she was still unaware of him.
The Braixen looking down at the paw he was on, having felt a itch on her paw.
11121121.content:
Mark didn't have that much time to get used to his surroundings or this situation that he was in. The thumping was getting louder, and the ground beneath him began shaking more and more. Just then, a large shadow got between Mark and the sun, leaving Mark surprised and in this sudden shade. Out of reaction, he looked upwards. In front of him was a pair of black, furry legs that connected to what looked like to be some bipedal fox. However, Mark knew right away that it was a Braixen! The yellow body fur, the white neck fur, the branch sticking out of it's tail, the orange fur coming out it's ears, it was definitely a Braixen alright!

Observing the towering fire fox up and down, Mark couldn't help but look between the legs of the fire type, since he was curious of what the gender would be of this Pokemon. A bright blush formed on his face when he saw the large slit between there. But now was not the time for that. He quickly shook the blush off and snapped back into reality. Right, he was somehow shrunken down to a very small size, and in front of a Pokemon that was approaching him closer every second.

Enough focusing on the beautiful female genital, he thought to himself, this Pokemon was getting closer and closer. However, the Braixen seemed that it wasn't aware that there was a shrunken human in her path. She was stretching out, her arms straight up, looking like she had just woken up almost. Her left paw thumped down, creating a tremble large enough for the micro human to be thrown off his feet and onto his butt. Quickly scrambling back up, Mark watched in awe as the Briaxen was almost right over him, but by sheer luck it would seem that she would miss stomping him by a few normal sized inches, which to Mark, was easily quite some feet.

Making the quick split second, he ran towards the paw that was closer to him, hoping he could hitch a ride. Right as the paw came down, Mark took a large leap, and grabbed onto the side of the paw. Luckily it was quite easy to grab onto because of all the fur, and Mark was able to hold onto the black fur as the paw raised up and came down again, which caused lots of shaking for the human. Hoping to be on a flatter surface, Mark began climbing up the side of the paw until he was on top, holding onto the fur for support and to not be flung off by the walking fox.

Mark sighed with relief as he relaxed. Alright, he completed phase one of his plan, get onto the Braixen. But now he needed to grab the attention of her. But for now, he just wanted to relax in this amazingly soft fur. Sure he was the size of a bug, but the feeling of the soft fur all over his body was bliss. After a few minutes of resting, Mark sat back up. The Briaxen seemed to have stopped walking at this point, and curious Mark wondered why, and had his question answered when he saw...
11121121.title: The Foxy Fox

choices: She sit down and relaxed making you fly somewhere on her
A berry juice hit you and you fall back to her paws
Nothing happen, you were still climbing
She feels itch on her knees and scratch it
111211211.content:
Mark looked up to the gigantic Braixen and that he sees her eating some berries by the bushes and that she is still unaware of her passenger that is right below her paws. She is on eating the berry that Mark has a chance to get her attention somehow and he hope that he isn't mistaken for a bug or something above him. He decides to get up from the strand of furs that was surrounding and start moving up while the Braxien enjoying her little snack from her walk.

Mark was climbing up her legs little by little by hanging to her fur that was like tree branches and he wonder how far he has to go since he was the size of a bug or should say flea since everything is pretty massive. He climb up and up making some progress on the gigantic pokemon who is still unaware of his presence and that she is still eating the berries from the branches. You can hear the chewing up above her head as she takes a huge bite into the berry and that some of the juices fall down to the ground making it splat. You hope that it doesn't hit you since those berries are pretty huge to you and probably like 3 or 4 times your size. Also, you not only you have to watch for the berries that could fall down from her mouth, but also her tiny movements of her legs as she can get restless and make you fall right to the ground or right back at her paws where you started from.

You were climbing up and making good progress despite your size. You were about on her knees until something happen..
111211211.title: The Braixen eating a berry. But it seemed that ...

choices: She doesn't hear you at all and still continuing eating the berry
She doesn't hear you but feels a tiny itch on her paws
She heard you but she doesn't know where you are
1112112112.content:
You were continuing to climb on her legs and making good progress until you heard sicking "Splat" coming from her mouth and that tiny little drop of juice coming out of her mouth and was heading towards your direction. You thought you could embrace the impact from the tiny drop but sadly the drop came fast and you notice that little drop was bigger than your whole. With the touch of your skin and her fur hitting you with the juice, you let go of the fur, falling to your doom to the ground. You brace for impact as you were heading down to ground with no safe parachute to catch your fall and that for a second you thought you are going to hit ground hard, but lucky you found yourself hitting something soft. It felt like a little cushion but still your body hurt from the impact.

You decided to get up after a few minutes thinking you are fine but really you felt like one of your bones break or something. You still tried to stand up and look to see where you are at. You looked up and notice that you were back where you started at her paws. Not only that but you are close between her toes.That maybe you should get out before it is too late. You still notice she is eating her berries still unaware of her passenger that is on her body as she continue eating. You start walking slowly and try again to climb up in attempt to get her attention. Also you tried shouting "HEY DOWN HERE HELP!" hoping to get her attention. You hope the last few screams heard your voice and that she would investigate at her paws....
1112112112.title: A berry juice hit you and you fall back to her ...

111232.title: How about Absol

choices: Is about to lay down, her neither region still hovering above Mark
Tries to sense any nearby disaster
1112321.content:
Strong tremors can be felt in a rythm like pattern, getting stronger by each one. Mark barely had time to wonder what is causing the world to shake before he caught a massive silhouette that stands high into the heavens. Before he could react, he sees that the silhouette grow closer until he could make out some details, and he was surprise to see what he saw. The silhouette belongs to a Absol, a very massive one, and its walking towards Mark's location.

"Hey! Down here!" Mark tries to shout out to the massive pokemon, but the pokemon shows no signs that it heard him. Before Mark knew it, one of its paws starts to hover above him. Mark panics as the paw hover over him, covering the whole sky to him. Very soon the paw descends and crash down. Thankfully for Mark, the Paw missed him by a few miles...to him. For the blissfully unaware Absol, the pokemon missed Mark by a centimeter.

Mark struggle to catch his breathe before the tremors continue again as Absol lift its paw again, which only means that one of the rear paw was going to make its way towards Mark. Mark saw the incoming paw and ran as fast as he could before the furry landmass makes contact again. Mark was able to avoid being crush again and notice that Absol doesn't seem to be moving at the moment.

Mark took the time to brush himself before looking up to wonder how in the world he is going to get this indescrible size pokemon to notice him. Well, he wonder that thought first before something caught his attention that made him blush. High above, he could see what looks like a pink slit that is absolutely massive to him. This Absol is a female.

Mark couldn't help but be distracted by the size of the slit. The whole thing looks like it could swallow cities with ease and still have plenty of room to swallow more. "How massive is this pokemon?" Mark asks himself, not realizing that Absol's body is shifting as she....
1112321.title: The Walking Disaster Herself

11123212.content:
"Pwahhh..." The planetary Pokemon sighs as she lets her paws slide out and away from her, bringing her white belly to the ground. For Mark, this meant a great cacophony. A celestial voice beats down upon the microbe, forcing him to submit to the will of the godly being and writhe upon the ground, clutching his poor overwhelmed ears.

With ringing ears, Mark opens his eyes to find that the previous display had been magnified! The dark lips seem ready to engulf the entire Earth, the pink tunnel seemingly able to contain oceans of liquid, and white hooded clitoris a despairingly enormous planet buster all on its own... This new view of a frequently observed Pokemon to him makes Mark shriek in utter fright, shortly before...

*KABOOOOM!!*

As soon as she was prone, the Absol knew she had chosen the right spot to rest. Her horn gives off a slight tingle as she stretches her paws, cooing lightly and letting her tail drop to the ground while she brings her forearms under her head. One last grind of her back end upon the ground, and the quadruped Pokemon is ready to rest, unwittingly bringing a new disaster for her captive...

Drops of some fluid hit the ground, the sound of which inspires Mark to open his eyes and see that he is in a dark cave. Light trickles through from somewhere, revealing that the walls are oddly pink, but more importantly... "I'm... I'm not dead!" Mark proclaims to no one in particular and follows up with a relieved laugh. He attempts to push himself up... only to have his hands slip on the slick surface he finds himself on. Where did he end up? A strong tremor causes Mark to abandon this thought path, making him dig his fingers into the spongy ground as his world is shook up. His fingers are pried from their grasp and the tiny man is tossed to and fro as the entire cave is rocked by some unseen force, he sinks into soft crevasses and is thrown out into open space just as quickly. Finally, the intense quakes stop and Mark is left rolling upon the damp ground.

Taking a few quick breaths, Mark feels for a dry patch of ground before getting up. He reaches into his pocket and pulls out his cell phone, which helpfully states that it is 4:51 PM, and turns on its flashlight function. The walls are most definitely pink. And moist. Maybe he was... launched into the Absol's vulva when she laid down...? If that's true, and he's inside the giant Pokemon's vagina, then he's at the mercy of her movements. He could probably be sent flying again with any slight movement on her part! Mark puts a hand to his mouth, and tries to ignore the sweet taste of whatever liquid he had picked up from the floor as he continues his thoughts. So... he could try to find where that light's coming from and get out that way... or find a place deeper inside the Absol's depths to hole up.

Mark decides to...
11123212.title: Banished to the Nether Regions

choices: Absol is still asleep, but having a wet dream
One of the ocean size droplets is heading towards Mark
111232121.content:
Parts of Mark is telling him that now would be a excellent time to get out while Absol isn't moving. However, a thought came to him. Absol was able to make what felt like a apocalyptic like event just from her walking. The world shook and practically drops within her footsteps, and she is only walking in what looks like a leisure stroll. Mark can only imagine what it would be like should he encounter another pokemon, probably bigger and is in a fight. Mark would never survive as he nothing more than a mere microbe to most, if not all, pokemon.

Terrifyied of what might be in store for him should he leaves, Mark looks at the other direction that leads deeper within Absol's vagina and decides to take shelter deeper within the unaware pokemon. After what felt like forever, Mark has been traveling deeper and deeper within the fleshy cavern. The cavern can be felt giving a gentle pulse from the pokemon's breathing, ocean size drops of fluid can be seen in what looks like the dozens, and once in a while Absol can be felt stirring her sleep, though thankfully not enough to cause Mark to bounce around. The light of the exit was now long gone as the microbe human continues to head further inside. Mark decides to take a break by going near one of the thousands of folds he has past since his decision to take shelter in the sleeping pokemon.

Mark sits down on the warm spongy ground and tries to catch his breath. He looks at his phone to see he has been walking for what might have been more than two hours as its past 7:00 PM. He wonders just how far he walk and how much further does he have to go before he thinks he safe enough.

Unfortunately for the microbe human, his thoughts were interrupted as he felt a rumble.
111232121.title: Living in the Squishy Cavern

1112321212.content:
While the severely shrunken boy continues his micro journey within the disaster Pokemon's nethers, his host's dreams remain undisturbed. Peaceful thoughts lie within her mind, a pleasant stroll through dreamland. "Mmhh~..." However, a low hum signifies a change in her thoughts, her dream just became even more pleasant. A tiny smile builds upon her lips and her loins spring to life...

Sitting upon the spongy pulsating ground, a sudden wet feeling at Mark's crotch quickly brings him back to reality. A pool of murky white fem-juices quietly bubbles around his lower body, the silvery substance slowly rises further! He gets to his feet... and his heart sinks at the scene his phone flashlight displays before him. A seemingly oceanic sea of excitement stretches as far as the circular beam illuminates! He swiftly turns and bolts away, wet feet squelching with every squishy step while the rising whirlpool chases its prey. Up he goes, feet sinking into the fleshy slope, threatening to trip him up. A loud, piercing moan rumbles throughout the cavern, knocking Mark off balance and sending him, once more, face first onto the pink, spongy floor!

A harbinger of oncoming events, the Absol's voice meant...
1112321212.title: A Pleasant Disaster

choices: Woke up and thought she feels something in her
11123212121.content:
"MMMHHH~" The sound of Absol grew loudly, drowing any noise that would be heard outside and thunders the whole squishy cavern. Mark struggles to remain on his feet, but the whole pink spongey surface grows slicker and harder to keep any footing. The ocean of juice soon start to rise higher, filling the area as pleasant dreams fill the planet size pokemon, unaware that her simple pleasure dream is endangering the microscopic human trapped inside her. It was a matter of time before Mark had no choice but to start swimming as the ocean juice risies with no signs of stopping. This only got worse as he soon felt a powerful rumble and soon felt his world tilting and turning.

Absol moans in pleasure as she rolls around, rubbing herself a little bit to the ground, with her back on the ground and her neither pointing up. A red blush flares up the Absol's face as she smiles in her sleep. Her dream soon intensifies, making her arouse, not aware of it nor would she know why should she wake up. The feeling was too grear that she just let's it happens in her sleep.

Mark struggles to stay on the surface of the ocean as he is force to swallow a mouth full of it to swim to the top. The cavern warps and pulses as the source of light is now high at the sky. Sounds of the ocean splashes againsts the walls as more and more juice secreats out, just filling the cavern with more juice.

The unfortunate microscpic human was in the middle of a pleasure storm as the goddess size pokemon continues to have the most pleasant dream she haven't had. Mark was so confuse as to why Absol was having this type of arousement before a low rumble noise could be heard hight above. He nervousely looks up only to see the source of light is getting blocked by something absurdly massive.

The entrance squelch and bends as something smooth and hard rams through it with ease. Soon the moan of Absol grew even lourder and the cavern grew increadibly warm as Absol....
11123212121.title: A Chostic Disaster

1112322.content: How about the illusion fox Zoroark?
1112322.title: The Fox of illusion

112.content: Which is going to be? The adorable Eevee? Or one of its adorable-as-well evolutions?
112.title: An eevee or eeveelution

choices: ... climb up onto her back, he had to get her attention!
... climb down, where her nethers were. Time for some fun!
Too late! The Eevee felt something climbing her and stopped!
1121.content:
The ground kept shaking beneath an utterly confused and scared Mark, who was trying to figure out just what was going on.

Why was everything so big? Was it because of that weird dream he had? But most importantly, where was he?

Before he could even try to find an answer to his questions, something happened: out of the bush he was staring at came something big and brown.

It looked like a paw of some kind, but it couldn't be...

Mark suddenly remembered what predicament he was in, and watched as a slim, brown figure followed the paw out of the bush.

Mark's eyes widened: brown fur, long ears, bushy tail... an Eevee! One of his favourite pokemon was walking right before his eyes... and it was huge!

"W-W-Wha...?" he muttered to himself. Pokemon didn't exist! Just what was happening?!

He wondered if this all had something to do with his dream. He remembered that sphere and its words, ‘I will make your wish come true.’ It wasn't a dream, was it?

Startled but amazed at the same time, Mark stared at the Eevee as it walked. Mercifully, he didn't get to meet its paws up close; instead, as its large abdomen came into view, Mark caught a glimpse of the Eevee's sex... and blushed massively as he looked at the cavernous slit that hovered above him.

Totally a female Eevee.

Another quake made Mark snap back to reality as he realized that the pokemon giantess didn't even notice him, and was walking away.

Urgently, he remembered that he was shrunken and in a foreign world. This could have been his only chance to get help... and from one of his favourite pokemon too!

Hastily, without even thinking twice, he sprinted towards one of the large legs. Luckily, the Eevee was walking rather slowly, so he had no problem catching up with her.

Now he only had to figure out how to get her attention...

"Hey! Down here!" Mark shouted, hoping that his tiny voice could be detected by the big ears of the Eevee.

Sadly, she gave no sign of having heard the shrunken human that was chasing her down.

Mark tried several other times to call out for her, but the Eevee didn't hear him. Either his voice was too faint or she was lost in her thoughts.

Desperate, Mark thought fast, his brain activity increased by the fear of being left alone and helpless in this giant world.

He wondered if there were other pokemon too... if there were, some of them were going to be very very dangerous. He only imagined what would have happened if he ran into a Primeape...

Shivering, Mark hastily figured that, to get her attention, he had to climb the brown titan he was chasing.

So, he sped up, towards one of the pillar of brown fur that walked away from him.

Mark sprinted towards one of the Eevee's hind legs and jumped, almost immediately feeling the soft fur under his hands.

He grasped some of the thick strands; the Eevee didn't appear to have noticed him as she kept walking.

Gripping her ankle, Mark tried to climb up, but the constant movement of the paw made the task ahead of him hard. It was a miracle if he was managing to hang on without falling on the ground, where he would surely be crushed by one the giant paws.

Grunting, Mark began climbing slowly, the strands of fur brushing against his whole body as he did; a single strand was as tall as he was, maybe even taller.

At least, he thought as he struggled to keep climbing, he had an idea of how small he truly was.

Seconds passed, minutes even, but for Mark felt like an eternity since he started climbing this gigantic pokemon who, unaware of the tiny human climbing her, kept walking towards an unknown destination.

Only after nearly an hour, Mark finally managed to reach her side.

He was panting heavily, and was now struggling to keep his grip on the thick, brown fur.

As the initial scare finally subsided, Mark looked up: he was almost there, he had almost reached the Eevee's back...

But then, his gaze traveled down, past her leg... again, he blushed as the giantess' uncovered sex came into view.

There he was, clinging to one of his favourite pokemon. Mark realized that he had an unique opportunity to have some fun with this Eevee, who seemed unaware of him... but at the same time, he also had to get her attention and help.

Still, he was living one of his most secret fantasies...

Was he feeling brave enough to explore the Eevee's nether regions?

"Hmm..." he said as he decided to...
1121.title: The brown giantess

choices: Mark makes it to her ear with no troubles
11211.content:
Mark shook his head...the temptation was there, but he needed to focus on more important things right now. Number 1 being survival in this incredibly giant and vast world.

He was blushing furiously though at the thought of going into her nethers but...maybe he'd get the chance later, for now, it was get Eevee's attention, and in the best case scenario, help.

Grunting, he continued his climb up for a few more minutes...his arms felt like limp and aching noodles, but soon enough he hoisted himself up onto her back. He could still feel the titanic and massive pokemon moving, but he fell down into her plush fur and just laid there, his entire body sweating and aching from his grueling climb up her simple leg.

"This is so fucking weird..." Mark muttered as his world shook to the rhythm of Eevee's movement.

For her part, she was quite content to keep walking, a smile on her face as she explored about, taking in the sights. She was blissfully unaware of her tiny little passenger.

Mark allowed himself a bit more of a rest before he sat up, looking around to see her face in the vast distance of her back.

"Still a ways to go..." Mark sighed as he got up and started walking. At least it'd be a hell of a lot easier than climbing her...though her movement made Mark have to struggle to keep his balance at times.

His goal...her large ears. If he got in one of them and tried to communicate he was sure he'd get Eevee to notice him.
11211.title: Keeping priorities

choices: ... on top of Eevee's nose, the giantess was staring at him!
... in the inside of her mouth, on Eevee's tongue!
112111.content:
Struggling to keep his balance, Mark took a step forward, looking at his objective: the two large pillars of fur standing on top of Eevee's head.

He had to get there, but it wasn't an easy task to accomplish: each step Eevee took made her back shake as she merrily walked through the thick woods, unaware of her tiny passenger.

Carefully, Mark walked across the thick sea of brown; at some point, as he approached the middle of Eevee's back, Mark stopped and sat down, exhausted from the climb he had done.

For a moment, he let all his thoughts slide out of his head along with his worries; the brown fur was incredibly soft, the shrunken human was almost tempted to drift off to sleep. Sadly, such temptation, like the one of paying Eevee's nethers a visit, was canceled from Mark himself as he remembered what he was supposed to be doing.

He got back on his feet and started walking through the brown forest once again.

The Eevee seemed to be feeling none of his movements, and was still walking.

Just where was she heading, Mark thought to himself as he finally reached a cream colored spot.

He sighed in relief: that was the back of Eevee's neck, covered in creamy fur. Mark looked up - the large ears were close. He just had to climb up onto her head, and he would finally be able to get the attention of this oblivious Eevee.

His feet stepped onto the thick creamy fur as he placed his hands on a vertical, round wall: Eevee's head.

Mark placed his foot onto the head as well as he began climbing once again, his hands gripping the brown fur, leaving the veritable jungle behind as he climbed up.

Mark discovered that he had an easier time climbing up Eevee's head than he had when he climbed up her leg.

Soon enough, he managed to reach the top of the brown hill and stepped onto Eevee's head.

And, much to the human's relief, the towering ears loomed above him, crafting two large shadows across the pokemon's head.

Wiping some sweat away, Mark moved up to one of the big ears and sat down by it, back against it.

He had finally done it, now he could get Eevee's attention! If only he wasn't feeling exhausted right now...

The fur was so soft, like a bed, surrounding him from every angle, while the large ear behind his head acted like a pillow.

For the second time, Mark felt the temptation to sleep.

But this time, he didn't fight it.

Darkness claimed his brain as he fell asleep right there, onto the Eevee's head, after having accomplished his primary objective.

--

Mark's eyes opened as he stared, once again, at a yellow and white sphere of light floating in front of him, surrounded by darkness.

Mark stared at it in silence for several minutes as the sphere lazily floated in front of him.

It giggled after several minutes.

"Enjoying your new predicament?" it asked in a feminine voice, startling Mark.

He carefully stepped back, fearing he could fall into void if he took a wrong step.

"W-Who are you?" he asked, staring at the sphere intently as it giggled again.

"I'm the one who made your wish come true! You're here because of me!" it chimed.

Mark looked dumbfounded.

"But... w-why?" he asked.

The sphere laughed.

"You were alone and your parents hated you! You wanted this, didn't you?" it asked.

Mark remained silent. To be honest, this WAS what he wanted, but he didn't know that it could actually happen!

Maybe that old say is true after all, ‘Careful what you wish for, you never know who might be listening’.

"... So I'm here because of you? Why am I tiny then?" he asked.

The sphere giggled once more.

"I know that was a big part of your dreams." it answered.

Mark stared at it.

"... Who are you?" he repeated, now curious more than scared.

The sphere giggled again, and began to assume a shape.

But then, Mark's surroundings began shaking as the shape started fading away.

"W-Wait...!" Mark shouted as the sphere disappeared, leaving him alone in darkness, in the middle of a veritable earthquake.

"Wh-What's happening?!"

--

Mark's eyes shot open, his upper body darted upwards as he looked forward startled, noticing a brown forest.

Mark froze.

Oh no...

Slowly, very very slowly, he turned his head back, noticing that he had been laying against a brown pillar... the Eevee!

So that wasn't a dream!

Mark jumped to his feet as he looked around... things had stopped shaking.

The Eevee he had been resting on appeared to be laying beneath a tree.

Mark walked to the very edge of the giantess' head, noticing that the Eevee had emulated him: she was asleep.

Remembering what he had to do, Mark turned back to look at the identical ears standing tall in front of him.

Quietly, Mark traveled back to them.

He smiled, feeling much safer now - he simply couldn't resist.

His mind went back to his dream - that sphere of light had made his dream come true, huh?

He wasn't sure how to feel about that.

But it was right about something - he could also enjoy this situation.

He placed a hand on the soft fur and started petting. Eevee was one of his favourite pokemon after all.

The ear and its twin counterpart twitched at his touch, and the Eevee's whole body shook.

And the giantess woke up sooner than Mark had anticipated, because the human suddenly found his location shifted from the top of her head to the air.

Eevee had thrown him off her head.

Mark tried to turn around, but wasn't able to.

After a short flight, Mark landed on a mercifully soft surface.

An accurate examination told Mark that he had landed...
112111.title: Furry Twin Towers

choices: “Eevee?” She spoke in a questioning tone
“A tiny human?” She spoke. Mark could understand her!
1121111.content:
Mark looked down to see he was on a squishy black surface...it wasn’t very large, barely bigger than him and in front of him was a large drop that he surely wouldn’t survive if he fell. He gulped and backed up as much as he could only to feel soft fur at his back. He turned around and realized where he was.

Eevee’s large brown eyes were on either side of him, with fur separating them...he was on her tiny nose!

And from what he could tell, she was looking right at him!

Eevee for her part had just taken a wonderful nap when she felt a slight twitch on her sensitive ears...waking up she felt something land on her nose and looked to find...something very very small, it almost looked...

Mark noted her observing him and his world shifted as Eevee slightly tilted her head, he yelped and cling to her fur in front of him, Eevee took note of this and immediately tilted her head straight again before lowering it to the grass below, her nose practically touching the dirt

Mark thought he understood and seeing the ground close once more he hopped off. He turned to see her entire face filling his vision. This whole situation provided a mix of fear, exhilaration and...if Mark’s pants didn’t lie, it all turned him on, he blushed, hoping the Eevee didn’t note this, but her mouth opened, hot air washing over him as she spoke.
1121111.title: An on the nose discovery

1122331.content:
Mark stumbled back, startled, a thousand thoughts in his head as he watched the bush in front of him shaking and the ground beneath him quaking.

Soon, something black came into view, followed by a figure.

The figure was very similar to an Umbreon, Mark noticed... before his eyes shot open: the figure WAS an Umbreon!

How could it be? Pokemon didn't exist!... Well, not that he had heard of shrunken humans before though... did he somehow end up in another world? This seemed so surreal...

The pokemon before him was quadruped, its body covered by black fur; it had red eyes and long ears which, along with its ankles, tail and forehead, had yellow rings.

An Umbreon indeed.

Lost in his own world of admiration, Mark was roughly called back to reality when a giant paw landed beside him, causing the ground to shake and him to fall on his rear end.

The Umbreon was walking away, unaware of the human it had just almost crushed beneath its paws.

Mark looked up, watching as the Umbreon above him walked, its large abdomen slid out of his eyesight to fill it with something else: her sex, a cavernous opening in between her legs. The pink slit was not very unnoticeable on the Umbreon's black fur.

The mere sight of it made a blush spread across Mark's face, before that too disappeared; Mark caught a glimpse of her butt and tail, before he had to turn his head in order to see the Umbreon.

He watched her leave, but quickly figured out that he couldn't stay there, tiny, lost and helpless.

So, without thinking, he sprinted towards the giant Umbreon and quickly caught up; hastily, he walked towards her left leg, running in order to keep up with the walking legs.

Mark looked up at the Umbreon's face, but she was looking forward and didn't notice him.

"Uh... hey! I need help!" he exclaimed, unsure if the Umbreon could hear him or not.

It seemed the second though, because her ears didn't even twitch.

"Hey!" Mark tried again, but the Umbreon still didn't hear him

The human felt the air leaving him as he had to run to keep up and shout out for the giantess at the same time.

So, he decided, he had to get on her first. It was going to be much easier to get the Umbreon's attention if he managed to found a perch anywhere on her body... he blushed. Maybe not certain places...

So, Mark hastily ran towards her landing paw; the pad made contact with the ground and he was quick to jump.

Luckily, Mark was able to grab onto the smooth, dark fur that surrounded the whole creature and sighed... before the sudden arising of the paw threw his sigh back down his throat.

Deciding that his current position was dangerous, Mark quickly climbed onto the Umbreon's paw, sitting on top of her three-toed paw; his fingers sank deep into the black fur and gripped it as Mark hung on, fearing the the Umbreon might have actually thrown him off her paw by merely walking. He found himself in a leafless black forest, the strands of fur were almost twice his height; he was surrounded by it and, whole it provided him with a soft, warm seat, it did also made it hard for the Umbreon to notice him.

Not that she was looking at her paw anyway.

The giantess didn't feel Mark on her paw and kept walking towards an unknown destination.

Deciding that the Umbreon wasn't going to pay him any mind while she walked, Mark decided to wait for her to stop to attempt to contact her.

Soon enough, he got used to the rising-and-falling of the paw; he also quickly discovered that there was no need for him to hang on: he was practically tangled in black fur, which impeded him to fall off.

Slightly relieved, Mark leaned back and waited.

But the Umbreon went on for a while, without stopping; the human on her paw relaxed and closed his eyes, enjoying the sensation that the surprisingly smooth fur have him.

Soothed, Mark started stroking the Umbreon mindlessly while she kept walking.

But, abruptly, the paw Mark was resting on landed with a bit more strength than he had gotten accustomed to.

This marked the end of Umbreon's walk.

Maybe... did the Umbreon feel him petting her paw and was checking?

Slowly, Mark opened his eyes and looked up, past the black, leafless trees that towered above him; he stared up at the Umbreon's huge face.

He felt a rush of air as he was lifted upwards towards the Umbreon's face, but unfortunately the forces of gravity caused him to start to slide down between two of her toes. 11431.content:
Mark watched the bush in from of him shaking as out of it came a giant figure that was fluttering above him.

The creature had creamy fur, orange hands and feet; for its height, it had incredibly long ears of the same color as its hands and had big, blue eyes, black nose and a small mouth, two pointy teeth peeking out of it.

Mark took a step back. This was a pokemon! But not any ordinary pokemon, it was a legendary!

Victini!

He stared at the giant in shock as it landed right in front of him. It didn't seem to have noticed the shrunken human by its feet though.

Instead, the legendary closed its eyes, stretched and flew over a nearby tree, sitting down at its foot. The Victini leaned back against the trunk, hands behind its head and legs spread.

Mark stared at it - did that legendary just go to take a nap without even noticing him?

He remembered that Victini was one of the smallest legendaries. Something that gave an idea of how small he was, given that the pokemon towered above him.

He carefully approached the pokemon - it was supposed to be harmless, despite the power Mark knew it possessed. Victini was supposed to be cheerful and gentle.

And Mark needed help right now, no matter if it was a pokemon.

He approached the sleeping giant, immediately noticing three things: one, it had already fallen asleep, he could tell by the almost imperceptible snoring of the titan and the rising and falling of its chest; two, it seemed to be way warmer around this legendary (no wonder from a fire-type); three, this giant was actually a giantess, he noticed by the large slit in between her spread legs.

Mark blushed, and looked away from it. He had to focus on how to get the attention of this sleeping titaness.

It didn't seem so hard - how could a legendary with such big ears not hear him? That seemed improbable.

Still, the Victini was asleep...

For good measure, Mark moved in front of one of the towering orange feet and poked it.

"H-Hey! I need help!" he shouted, hoping that the Victini would wake up. The muscles of the sole twitched lightly, and the Victini gave a slight giggle in her sleep, but she didn't wake up.

Mark tried again.

"Hey! Victini! Please wake up!" he called, again poking the large foot of the pokemon, receiving the same response as earlier: a twitch and a giggle, but no signs of the giantess waking up anytime soon.

"Please... wake up!" Mark continued, sliding his hand along the length of the warm foot.

This time, he obtained a different answer: a moan.

This gave him an idea: he started rubbing the foot with both hands, causing Victini to moan more loudly in her sleep.

The foot twitched under his palms, but Victini still didn't show any signs of wanting to wake up.

Soon, Mark's arms felt sore, and he had to stop rubbing; Victini was wearing a pleased smile on her sleeping face.

"Damn it..." Mark whispered as the giantess relaxed, her foot flailing weakly, almost as if it missed the attention of the hands of the shrunken human.

Now what?

What could he do now to wake the sleeping titaness?

He glanced at her... maybe, he could have climbed up to her ears to get her attention...

He looked down, wondering for how long he would have to climb... his gaze landed once again on the Victini's sex.

He blushed, but... maybe it wasn't necessary to climb, he figured.

If he could please that sensible area of the Victini, she would have woken up much faster, without the risk of Mark falling from her body and onto the ground, where he could end up seriously injured... or worse...

But... if the Victini woke up and spotted a tiny human rubbing her crotch, what would have happened then?

Would she be angry? Mischievous?

That was a legendary, a creature with immense power, how could Mark face her wrath if she was angry?

Something in Mark's mind told him that he had better chances if he attempted to climb the Victini instead.

He pulled back from the foot and approached the giant body of the legendary, deciding what should he have done.

Either way, he had to get her attention.

11432.content:
A very confused Mark stumbled back as he saw the plants around him shaking.

Just what did this all mean? Why was everything so big? Or was he tiny? And, most importantly, where he even was?

He looked at the shaking bushes.

And finally, something came out.

At first, Mark didn't see it too well; but then, a figure came forward, hovering in mid-air.

And Mark recognized it - it was Celebi!

Body of two shades of green, round feet, long and slender arms, wings, blue eyes with dark eyelids and antennas on top of its head.

Yep, it was definitely the legendary, time-traveling pokemon Celebi!

A large shadow was casted over the shrunken human as the legendary hovered forward, not even noticing Mark.

Just as she flew past him, Mark caught a glimpse of something that made him go red as a pepper: the Celebi's sex.

And it was a girl, judging by the pink slit being one of the few color differences on her body.

His mind unable to process what was going on, Mark watched as the time-traveler flew forward.

Then, reality struck him hard.

He was alone, in a world he didn't know. But that was obviously a pokemon.

Were there other humans as well in this world, Mark wondered, were they tiny like him?

He quickly discovered that he really didn't care.

Whatever he was or not the only human in this world, he had to get the attention of the Celebi right now.

Like this, he currently has no chance of survival. And, he had to get the attention of the green fairy - who was notoriously a docile and kind pokemon despite the power he knew she possessed; if Mark could obtain her help, it'd be simply great.

And if not her help, at least her protection.

The protection of a legendary. And one of his favourite too. Just looking at the green giantess, who was unaware of him, made Mark's pants feel tight all of a sudden.

He focused on the fairy, finding her busily searching for something in a bush, giving him a clear visual of her behind.

The shrunken human blushed brightly, before shaking his head and moving towards Celebi; if he waited too long, she would leave and he'd be doomed.

Hastily, Mark sped towards the fairy, who finally pulled back from the bush, triumphantly holding a tiny, round berry, which Mark identified as a Cheri Berry. The bush seemed to be full of those, he noted by the several red spots on the green.

Calmly, Celebi started eating the berry; then, she ate another, and another. She seemed to like that kind of berries.

But that just kept her glued to the bush, giving you a chance to catch up with her.

Mark stood beneath the floating pokemon, suddenly aware a few sweet scents, presumably coming from Celebi herself, he could tell by the strong smell of mint and grass he was smelling by merely standing under her.

Mark inhaled deeply, filling his lungs with the almost sickeningly sweet scent, before taking a few steps, admiring the towering fairy as she ate.

He had to find a way to get to her attention, but what could he do? Celebi was hovering, he couldn't even reach her feet!

Mark looked around, hoping to find something that would help him out. He saw the berry bush Celebi was eating from, the grass, which wasn't of any help, a small log...

The log.

Mark looked at Celebi again - her foot was right in front of the log.

If he only could climb to the top, he would be able to jump on top of her foot, and from there climb up to her face!... Or maybe, take a little ‘break’ near her nethers...

Blushing, Mark decided that it was a good idea.

He moved towards the log and placed his hands onto the wood, his fingers gripping it as he began scaling the fallen log.

He found that the task wasn't particularly easy, as each two inches he progressed, he slid back down one inch.

But, finally, the shrunken human was able to climb up to the top.

He managed to find his balance and took a minute to catch his breath, again inhaling that wonderful smell.

A satisfied sigh coming from above made him choke on his last breath; the Celebi was done eating, she was rubbing her belly with her eyes closed.

Mark's gaze couldn't help but travel down, lingering on her sex once again - it was surely big enough for him to fit completely inside... maybe he WAS going to stop there when he started climbing...

Mark shook his head as he noticed the Celebi stretching her arms, before she started flying forward, away from the log.

Mark noticed on the very last second and remembered to jump.

The green platform that was her foot was getting away from him...

Thinking fast, Mark extended his hands as he hovered towards the leaving foot, grabbing a hold of its edge and dangling from it like it was a cliff, an ocean of green under him.

Celebi seemed to have felt nothing as she kept flying, unaware of the presence on her body.

Struggling to keep his grip, Mark placed his own feet against the side of Celebi's foot and grabbed as much of it as he could with his hands as he lifted himself onto it.

The green skin was incredibly soft and warm, he noticed, and for a moment, he felt tempted to rest, once again enjoying the smell of grass that Celebi emanated.

A new doubt distracted Mark - maybe Celebi had felt and noticed him?

He looked up.

114331.content:
Mark looked around in confusion as the ground trembled and the plants shook - what was going on?

Struggling to keep his balance, he looked at the bush as a small (huge to Mark) purple mouse with a white belly and red eyes came out.

Mark barely had time to see that it looked like a Rattata, the first pokemon found in the wild after Pidgey in games.

In the few instants before the mouse sprinted off, Mark realized that it WAS a Rattata! He also remembered that he was alone and lost right now.

And, judging by the fact that the mouse was several times his height, he was also shrunken.

"W-Wait!" he shouted as he started running behind the Rattata. He wasn't sure what help a mouse could give him, but it was better than nothing, he figured as he sprinted after the purple mouse.

But, by the time Mark reached a grassy field, the Rattata was gone.

Mark sighed - what was he supposed to do now? Sit down, recollect his thoughts and wait for someone to find him? If there was a pokemon, there were more, no?

Or should he have searched for someone by himself? That seemed a poor choice, he didn't know if there were humans as well in this place.

Because, it was clear, Mark wasn't in his world anymore.

He had always dreamed of meeting pokemon, he had always dreamed of meeting GIANT pokemon, but he didn't think it could have happened for real!

Mark sighed as he looked around.

Surely enough, he couldn't stay there forever, he had to at least find a shelter.

His eyes fell on an entrance in a stone wall - a cave.

Perfect, he thought as he started walking.

--

It took Mark almost an hour to reach the giant cave in his reduced state, but he eventually managed to step inside, immediately getting assaulted by cold air.

Shivering a bit, he made his was deeper inside, wondering if there was someone in this cave.

In that case, either he tried to get the attention of whoever it was or he left the cave as fast as he could.

It depended on the pokemon/human he found in there, he decided. If there was an Ursaring waiting for him in this cave, the choice was clear.

For a while, Mark kept walking in silence, his steps on the stone floor being the only noise that could be heard.

But then, he eventually reached the end of the cavern, he could tell by the large walls forming a circular, closed space.

But something else jumped out as well: a large, circular rock was placed right at the end of the cavern.

It wouldn't have been nothing out of ordinary, if it wasn't for the pokemon laying on it.

Mark felt his breath being cut short.

That was no ordinary pokemon.

It had a white face, and a yellow, star-shaped head; its body was apparently yellow, but Mark knew that those were the tail of the pokemon, which had in reality a white body with a third eye placed on its belly.

Jirachi.

Mark was staring at Jirachi, a wish-granting legendary!

Without thinking, he approached the sleeping pokemon - he always liked the adorable little pokemon. He had it in his team in one of his games, and he loved how the now not-so-little legendary always won battles with Doom Desire.

And now, there it was, Jirachi, a giant sleeping before him.

Without thinking, Mark placed his hands on the rock started climbing it, wanting to admire the cute titan up close.

According to pokemon legends, Jirachi slept for a whole millennia before waking up for one week. For a moment, Mark stopped: was he going to have to wait a millennia to get help?! That wasn't even possible...

He shook his head. Probably, it was a simple legend, he thought as he resumed climbing. Plus, Jirachi was supposed to envelop itself in a cocoon when it slept for a thousand years, no?

Just as Mark was about to reach the top though, Jirachi suddenly stretched, its two tails unwrapping from its body as it extended its arms and raised its head, before it fell back down as the creature relaxed again.

It had almost woken up, Mark thought with a sigh of relief.

So, either it was its millennial week of being awake or the legend was false.

Hastily, Mark climbed up onto the rock that was Jirachi's perch and admired its white body - he couldn't be taller than one of the giant's fingers.

Curiosity overtook Mark - now he needed to know something.

In games, like most of the legendaries, Jirachi was asexual.

Now Mark felt curious to know, and traveled to the legendary's legs... he blushed, noticing that the titan was actually a titaness , he could tell by the pink slit on the endless white.

So, Jirachi was a female, huh?

Mark smiled - he had no clue of how he ended up here, but getting to meet his favourite pokemon up close was an opportunity he'd-

Mark stopped for a moment, memories coming back to his mind.

Usually, a person doesn't often remember what dream they were having during sleep, but Mark remembered that a sphere of white and yellow light was floating right in front of him.

It told: ‘I will make your dream come true...’

Mark's eyes shot open.

Jirachi's colors matched the one of the sphere... and the legendary was supposed to be able to grant wishes... and the voice in his dream was a feminine one...

"Oh... my... God..." Mark mumbled as he regarded the sleeping giantess, who seemed to be smirking.

Jirachi granted his wish?! How did that even happen?!

He looked at the legendary, not sure if to feel blissful or shocked.

Mark shook his head as he remembered that he was here because he had to get help.

But then, his gaze traveled to the Jirachi's crotch.

He blushed... but, after all, Jirachi was his favourite pokemon, and she was asleep...

Could he risk having some fun with her, even in this dire situation?

"Hmm..."
114331.title: Make a wish- oh wait...

choices: Jirachi didn't seem to notice Mark...
1143311.content:
Putting his lewd thoughts aside for a moment, Mark urgently recalled what his current situation was.

Shrunken, in a foreign world and, if he failed to get attention, alone.

So, he decided, his priority was to get the attention of the Jirachi. The same pokemon that apparently was the cause of all his current problems (and the same pokemon that made all his most intimate dreams come true though).

So he went back to Jirachi's hip area and stared up for several seconds, wondering how could he wake up such titan with the mere help of his voice.

Would she even be able to hear him even when she woke up?

"Um... Hey!" Mark screamed, uncertain. Predictably, Jirachi totally didn't hear him.

"Hey!" the shrunken human by her side shouted, a bit more convinced: again, Jirachi didn't seem to have heard him, though her breathing paused briefly, as if she was sensing an annoyance in her sleep, before her breathing resumed regularly.

Mark sighed.

"Hey! I need your help, please!" he tried again but, again, he got the same response: silence.

Damn it.

In frustration, Mark punched the side of the giantess; immediately afterwards, a sound erupted around him.

It took Mark several moments of blinking in confusion to realize that Jirachi had just giggled.

Mark looked at the titaness, then at his fist while his mind put two and two together.

Reluctantly, Mark pulled his hand back and punched the soft wall in front of him again.

Jirachi giggled again.

Mark grinned to himself. So this was what he had to do, huh?

Immediately, the unfortunate human drove his fist into Jirachi again, then his other fist joined in, the whole process followed by Mark's knee colliding with the side of the pokemon.

He didn't feel too bad - Jirachi was probably feeling nothing but a tickle, he judged by the incessant stream of giggles that escaped her mouth.

It was a miracle she didn't still wake up.

Mark kept going until something finally happened: Jirachi was starting to move! He had done it!

Relieved, Mark took a step back and watched as the titaness fidgeted in her sleep before she... simply rolled onto her side.

Mark had less than a split second to realize what was happening, before he found an immense pressure falling on him as he disappeared beneath Jirachi.

Trapped between the hard, cold, grey stone and the soft, warm, white skin, Mark could do literally nothing but squirm helplessly, feeling the giant Jirachi pressing him deep into the rock.

He had to get out from under here, fast.

The only question was: how?

Hastily, Mark did the first thing he could think of and started tried to push back the immense Jirachi; an obviously futile attempt that could be compared to him trying to lift a mountain. Or the moon, given what pokemon it was, he thought with a sour smirk.

Heat assaulted the trapped human as his arms went limp. He had to think of something better.

He thought about squirming out, but then his mind told him that, thanks to the rock beneath him, he was going to end up skinned.

The same voice in his head told him that it was a wider move to wait until Jirachi shifted on her back again, and hope she was quick doing so... before she either crushed him or he ran out of air.

Mark laid there for what had to be an eternity (he couldn't really keep track of time while trapped beneath a literal mountain), but kept still, using the least amount of air to breathe.

And finally, after a while, Jirachi readjusted and rolled onto her back, freeing the poor human, who inhaled deeply as the gigantic white pokemon left him.

Feeling sore, Mark stood back up onto shaky legs and glanced at the sleeping form of Jirachi, wondering if he still had to get her attention or climb back down,leave this cave to never return.

... That would be a stupid move, he decided.

Hastily, his brain thought of a new way to awaken the giantess.

Quietly, he moved up to her side again, dug his hands into the white skin and began scaling the legendary.

--

Only after nearly an hour, panting, sweating, exhausted, Mark managed to climb on top of Jirachi's belly.

The mythical pokemon kept sleeping throughout the whole thing.

Mark stood on top of the stomach, feeling it vibrating softly under his feet: Jirachi was going to be hungry whenever she woke up.

Mark studied his surroundings, immediately spotting something right beside him.

It seemed like...

A bit weirded out, Mark recalled that Jirachi had a third eye on her stomach, and that eye was apparently her main one. And this beside him was right its closed eyelid.

A new idea got to him... this was going to be weird.

Mark walked in circles around the eye (which was roughly twice his height), then knelt, beginning to rub the eyelid with one hand, glancing at Jirachi.

Almost immediately, Jirachi's sleep became suddenly agitated; her arms fidgeted, her legs shook.

And, finally, the legendary opened a pair of water-blue eyes, her head rising up.

Mark watched as Jirachi rubbed her eyes with two stubby paws, before said eyes fell on her... eye.
1143311.title: The awakening of a legend

choices: Jirachi seemed to recognize Mark -  she granted his wish!
Jirachi seemed confused - why was a tiny human there with her?
11433111.content:
The Jirachi looked around, trying to spot whatever awakened her from her sleep, but the cave she was sleeping in was deserted aside from her, she noticed.

Mark observed the giantess as her gaze darted around.

To help her see him, he began rubbing her third, true eye again. It seemed to have an effect on the giantess, because her has shifted once more as she felt an itch on her belly, where her true eye was.

And there, standing on top of her stomach, Jirachi spotted the cause of her awakening: a small bug, right on her third eye.

Too tired to check it out, Jirachi decided to simply dispose of it; she moved a paw in Mark's direction.

The shrunken human felt relieved when he saw her gaze fixed on him and her paw approaching him, but his relief was short-lived; and it was when the three stubby fingers slapped him that he realized that Jirachi must have mistaken him for a bug or something.

Mark made a short flight into the air, watching as the paw that removed him from his perch rose again, ready to return to its original place.

Mark took the opportunity and, desperately trying to control his flight, he landed straight on top of the back of Jirachi's hand, before starting to stomp on her knuckle furiously.

Again, the giantess noticed the sensation and, opening the eyes she had closed once again, she discovered that the same bug was now on the back of her paw.

Annoyed, the legendary shook her paw to get rid of it, but Mark, having sensed the incoming threat of becoming paste on the stone floor or on one of the stone walls, hastily knelt and clinged to Jirachi's paw.

He felt sick as the paw shook back and forth, but he stubbornly hung on until the shaking ended.

Dizzily, he looked back at the legendary with blurry eyes; it was with great surprise that Jirachi noted the bug still on her paw.

No longer tired, and having taken a major interest in the little guy, the legendary brought her paw to her face, right in front of her huge blue eyes.

Mark signed in relief, while Jirachi took notice of something odd: the bug she had been trying to get rid of was no bug at all.

It was a human!
11433111.title: A legend's discovery

choices: Jirachi pulls the third tag from the top of her head and reads it
114331112.content:
Even for Jirachi, this was unusual. As she often did when confronted by the unexpected, she shifted her eyes to the side where a cyan tag hung off the side of her head. Something was written there, and it was not in the usual hiragana or kanji. In refined english writing, it read,

I wish I was smaller

Jirachi quickly turned her gaze back to the human in her hand, staring in disbelief. Again, this was no common occurrence. The process of deciding which wish to grant always came to Jirachi during or soon after waking up, a time when all her mental faculties weren't in place. People would wish for good fortune and perhaps something nice would come to them. Why not? Others would wish for more outrageous things, and she would subconsciously skip over them during her hibernation. Wouldn't want to give some jerk world domination by accident.

Yet here he was. A tiny, tiny human in the palm of her hand. He seemed too stunned to speak up. Had this been a monkey's paw scenario? Had he maybe wished to fit into a smaller pair of pants and she had interpreted it as shrinking him down into a flightless fly? She couldn't remember. All she remembered wanting to make someone's dreams come true. Surely being reduced to this size couldn't be his real wish, could it? She had to force herself to keep steady enough just so he wouldn't fall down to his death!

Shaking her head, she realized her other wish tag had been altered as well. This wish was made in a different, slightly slurry handwriting, yet its contents were still intelligible,

I wish for love

Despite being ever-so slightly shorter than the previous sentence, Jirachi stared at this one a lot longer. Trying to interpret it. Had she also put this human under a love spell? Unlikely, seeing the look of surprise more present than attraction on his expression. Had someone else come to love this human? Perhaps a different person? Perhaps even a Pokémon? Or perhaps-

She didn't have to finish her own thought as she felt her cheeks redden. Aha. In her sleep-addled state she had decided the most practical solution for this wish would be to offer herself as the bringer of love. She WAS a very lovable creature after all, or at least that's what she had heard. There was little time to second-guess this decision as her mind was soon flooded with rose-tinted memories of this human. How she had watched him from afar, desperately longing to speak with him, to be with him, yet kept worlds apart by cruel fate, only able to share her feelings and desires in dreams. All fake memories, of course. Or were they? Regardless, he was starting to look really cute. The effect that had been so faint at first came crashing down upon her as she was overcome by the urge to get a lot more involved with this small human. Whatever the third wish upon her head was could wait until later.

Meanwhile, Mark noticed a shift in atmosphere. The giantess had gone from sleeping to sleepy to alert, and now back to lidding her eyes again. Yet somehow her gaze appeared to be focusing more intently on him. If this was a good or a bad thing he was unsure, but finding himself in the palm of a normally pint-sized yet now mountain of a genie meant he would probably soon find out.
114331112.title: A three-pronged wish

choices: Give me the Galar region Legendaries
1143323.content: Let's try the Galar region Legendary Pokemon.
1143323.title: Other

11433231.content: Was it Zamazenta or Zacien?
11433231.title: Give me the Galar region Legendaries

12.content:
...nothing.

"I guess it must've been the wind." he said.

Suddenly, the familiar rhythmic earthquake returns which immediately scared as he quickly hides inside the bush. Whatever is it is getting closer.

He popped out to see what it was and once he finally saw the source, his mouth dropped down to see that right before his eyes was...
12.title: a anthro

13.content: About some of the Eeveelutions
13.title: a pokemorph

info.brief_description: You wake up in the pokemon world and you somehow got shrunk.
info.description:
Mark(you) are a 19 year old boy that wakes up in the pokemon world. But you notice that everything is bigger, even the pokemon.


Rules:

1. Mark cannot die in the story
2. All the pokemon are female
3. Try and have good grammar
4. No butt or fart chapters. They are gross
5.Anthros and pokemorphs are allowed
6. Mark cant be seen by anybody
